sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        style="background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(187, 111, 59), rgb(0, 0, 0))"
        shrink-on-scroll
        height="220px"
        src='../../../../../assets/images/stage.png'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
        app
        :style="appbarStyle"
    >
      <template v-slot:img="{ props }">
        <v-img
            v-bind="props"
            gradient="to top, rgba(0,0,0,.8), rgba(0,0,0,.2)"
        ></v-img>
      </template>
      <the-heading-navbar/>
    </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
import TheHeadingNavbar from "@/components/heading/TheHeadingNavbar.vue";
export default {
  components: {TheHeadingNavbar},
  computed: {
    appbarStyle() {
      switch (this.$vuetify.breakpoint.name) {
        case 'sm': return "height:30px;"
        case 'md': return "font-size:28px;position:relative;"
        case 'lg': return "9px;"
        case 'xl': return "10px;"
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .v-app-bar {
    width: 100%;
  }
</style>
